message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
Hey Alice, $150 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $110 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can do $130, but I'm not going any lower than that. It's a great product, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
Alice, $130 is still a bit above my budget. How about $120? It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm really interested in this product.
